# Overlap known SNPs with MHcut's output


```{r load}
## For data manipulation
library(data.table)  # good for big data
library(dplyr)  # To manipulate/transform data.frames
library(magrittr)  # pipes (e.g. %>%)
## For tables
library(knitr)

library(GenomicRanges)

## Read the first row (headers) to remind us the order of each column
var = read.table("../scripts-dbSNP-ClinVar/mhcut-dbsnp-clinvar-deletion-indelphi-variants.tsv.gz", nrows = 1)
var = fread("gunzip -c ../scripts-dbSNP-ClinVar/mhcut-dbsnp-clinvar-deletion-indelphi-variants.tsv.gz",
            select = c(1:4, 20, 21, 23, 24))
head(var)
```

## Subset of variants

Let's work with a random subset of 100K variants.
This should be enough to produce good estimates.

Let's say we are interested in variants with at least 3 bp of mh1L.

```{r subset}
var = var[sample.int(nrow(var), 1e5)]
var.s = as.data.frame(subset(var, mh1L>2))
var.s %<>% mutate(id=paste(chr, start, end, RS, sep='_'))
```

## Micro-homology regions

```{r mhregs}
fl1 = with(var.s, GRanges(var.s$chr, IRanges(ifelse(flank==1, start-mh1L, start),
                                             ifelse(flank==1, start, start+mh1L)),
                          id=id, flank=1))
fl2 = with(var.s, GRanges(var.s$chr, IRanges(ifelse(flank==1, end-mh1L, end),
                                             ifelse(flank==1, end, end+mh1L)),
                          id=id, flank=2))
fl.gr = c(fl1, fl2)
```

## Common SNPs in the human population

```{r snps}
if(!file.exists('snp151Common.txt.gz')){
  download.file('http://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg38/database/snp151Common.txt.gz', 'snp151Common.txt.gz')
}
snps = fread('gunzip -c snp151Common.txt.gz', select=c(2:4,8,23,25))
snps = as.data.frame(snps)
colnames(snps) = c('chr', 'start', 'end', 'ref', 'als', 'freqs')
snps = makeGRangesFromDataFrame(snps)
```

## Overlap

```{r ol}
fl.gr$snp.ol = overlapsAny(fl.gr, snps[which(width(snps)==1)])
fl.id = fl.gr %>% as.data.frame %>% group_by(id) %>% summarize(snp.ol=any(snp.ol))
fl.id %>% group_by(snp.ol) %>% summarize(n=n()) %>% ungroup %>% mutate(prop=n/sum(n)) %>%
  kable
```
